description:
EVERY TIME I HIT YOU… YOU NEED TO TELL GOD YOU ARE SORRY!

Your Step-Mom London wants to have a chat with you. She caught you masturbating in your room. Didn’t you know that God is everywhere? You must be disciplined! First you must be spanked over her knee until you ass is red. Your Seed should NEVER BE SPILLED!

Next she breaks out a large wooden paddle and smacks your ass until it is even redder. Then she whips out her cane smacking your tender calves “Jesus didn’t suffer so you could ignore his rules.” She says.

When you finally do find a woman she is going to want you to be a strong forceful man. Now Mommy is going to teach you how. She is going to teach you how to not get a woman pregnant… By fucking you in the ass with the biggest strap-on dick you have ever seen… If she is pleased by your learning Mommy may even make you cum with a giant cock in your ass!
title: TRAINING YOU FOR MARRIAGE AND SERVICE TO THE LORD - STRICT STEP-MOTHER
